ProjectArr.shortDescription: An app that helps you track your mood and tasks for the day
ProjectArr.longDescription: Mental Health Journal is an app for people who struggle with mental health and would like to keep track of it and improve it.

ProjectArr.shortDescription: Never forget to do your tasks again.
ProjectArr.longDescription: An app to help you keep track of your tasks for busy or relaxed days.

ProjectArr.shortDescription: Find your favourite Rick and Morty character
ProjectArr.longDescription: A list of Rick and Morty characters for hardcore fans. Fetched from the rickandmorty api.
